title: Stream on Twitch
body:
Wanna watch some League of Legends Gold Gameplay? Come and have a look. I am streaming right now and normally daily from 1 pm to 5 pm.
See you soon in the Rift! ^:)

replies.body:
Who wants to see a Gold player streaming? o.O
I guess no1 but it would help if you sent the stream link dude {{champion:17}}

Gut dass du deinen Streamlink nicht postest, sonst k√∂nnte ja noch jemand zu schauen.

PS Wir sind hier im deutschen Forum.{{champion:17}}
